titles.ar: باب أَنَّ الْفَرَائِضَ لَا تُقَامُ إِلَّا بِالسَّيْفِ
titles.en: Chapter 3 – The The Obligations cannot be established except by the sword

titles.ar: باب أَنَّ الْمِيرَاثَ لِمَنْ سَبَقَ إِلَى سَهْمِ قَرِيبِهِ وَ أَنَّ ذَا السَّهْمِ أَحَقُّ مِمَّنْ لَا سَهْمَ لَهُ
titles.en: Chapter 2 – The inheritance is for the one who precedes to a share of his near ones, and that the the one with a (legislated) share is more deserving than the one who has no (legislated) share for him

titles.ar: باب أَنَّ الْفَرَائِضَ لَا تُقَامُ إِلَّا بِالسَّيْفِ
titles.en: Chapter 3 – The The Obligations cannot be established except by the sword

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: صحيح - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/119)

narrator_chain.text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ وَ عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ جَمِيعاً عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ هِشَامِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: لَا يَسْتَقِيمُ النَّاسُ عَلَى الْفَرَائِضِ وَ الطَّلَاقِ إِلَّا بِالسَّيْفِ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad and Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, altogether from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hisham Bin Salim,
Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> has said: ‘The people will not be correct upon the Obligations (legislated shares of inheritance) and the divorce, except by the sword’.
en.sarwar: 1. Muhammad ibn Yahya has narrated from Ahmad ibn Muhammad and Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from his father from all from ibn abu ‘Umayr from Hisham ibn Salim who has narrated the following: “Abu ‘Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘People do not behave properly in matters of obligations and divorce without the sword (enforcing authority).’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (3/120)

narrator_chain.text: حُمَيْدُ بْنُ زِيَادٍ عَنِ الْحَسَنِ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ بَعْضِ أَصْحَابِهِ عَنْ إِبْرَاهِيمَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ إِسْمَاعِيلَ عَنْ دُرُسْتَ بْنِ أَبِي مَنْصُورٍ عَنْ مَعْمَرِ بْنِ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَبِي جَعْفَرٍ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ

text: لَا تَقُومُ الْفَرَائِضُ وَ الطَّلَاقُ إِلَّا بِالسَّيْفِ .

en.hubeali: Humeyd Bin Ziyad, from Al Hassan Bin Muhammad, from one of his companions, from Ibrahim Bin Muhammad Bin Ismail, from Dorost Bin Abu Mansour, from Moamar Bin Yahya,
Abu Ja’far<sup>asws</sup> has said: ‘The Obligations (legislated shares of inheritance) and the divorce cannot be established except by the sword’.
en.sarwar: 2. Humayd ibn Ziyad from al-Hassan ibn Muhammad from certain persons of his people from Ibrahim ibn Muhammad ibn ’Isma‘il from Durust ibn abu Mansur from Mu’ammar ibn Yahya who has narrated the following: “Abu Ja‘far, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, has said, ‘Obligations and divorce are not dealt with properly without the sword.’”

gradings: Allamah Baqir al-Majlisi: ضعيف - Mir‘at al ‘Uqul Fi Sharh Akhbar Al al Rasul (23/120)

narrator_chain.text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ مُحَمَّدِ بْنِ عِيسَى عَنْ يُونُسَ عَنْ يَحْيَى الْحَلَبِيِّ عَنْ شُعَيْبٍ الْحَدَّادِ عَنْ يَزِيدَ الصَّائِغِ قَالَ

text: سَأَلْتُ أَبَا عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) عَنِ النِّسَاءِ هَلْ يَرِثْنَ الرِّبَاعَ فَقَالَ لَا وَ لَكِنْ يَرِثْنَ قِيمَةَ الْبِنَاءِ قَالَ قُلْتُ فَإِنَّ النَّاسَ لَا يَرْضَوْنَ بِذَا قَالَ فَقَالَ إِذَا وُلِّينَا فَلَمْ يَرْضَ النَّاسُ بِذَلِكَ ضَرَبْنَاهُمْ بِالسَّوْطِ فَإِنْ لَمْ يَسْتَقِيمُوا ضَرَبْنَاهُمْ بِالسَّيْفِ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from Muhammad Bin Isa, from Yunus, from Yahya Al Halby, from Shuayb Al Haddad, from Yazeed Al Saig who said,

‘I asked Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> about the women, do they inherit the real estate? So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘No, but they inherit the value of the building’. I said, ‘But the people are not pleased by that’. So he<sup>asws</sup> said: ‘When we<sup>asws</sup> rule and the people are not pleased with that, we<sup>asws</sup> will strike them with the whip. So if they are not straightened (by that), we<sup>asws</sup> will strike them with the sword’.
en.sarwar: 3. Ali ibn Ibrahim has narrated from Muhammad ibn ‘Isa from Yunus from Yahya al-Halabiy from Shu’ayb al-Haddad from Yazid al- Sa’igh who has narrated the following: “I once asked abu ‘ Abd Allah, ‘Alayhi al-Salam, about women; if they inherit from the house. He (the Imam) said, ‘No, but they inherit from the value of the building.’ I (the narrator) then said, ‘People do not agree with it.’ He (the Imam) said, ‘When we will be in authority if people disagree we will use the sword and whip and if they will not behave properly we will strike them with the sword.’”
